extendedInfo.description: Show the latest traffic and travel information for England and Scotland on your phone. Search for the nearest traffic problem to you.Sort incident list by time, distance or severity.Show incidents as a list or on a Google map.Search around a location or along a custom route.You can customise your searches for example :-* Show traffic and roadworks along my route to work.* Show traffic within 5 miles of Heathrow airport.* Show traffic for the whole of England and Scotland.Your favorite searches can be saved so that you can access them again quickly.Data is read from the Highways Agency and Traffic Scotland traffic feeds and stored locally in a database for instant access, so even if you have not got a data connection, you will see the traffic details from your last update.Data is updated in the background automatically, so upon refreshing you will see up to the minute traffic news.

reviews.title: No controls?
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t seem to have any means of controlling what information is displayed - just a long unsorted and uncategorised list of traffic reports from all over the country.   I\'ve tried tapping all over the screen but nothing appears.   How is it that other reviewers can rave about it, while others like me find it useless - is there a download/installation problem?  Chartcross tell me to use the menu button.   Have they not read what I have written?    There is no menu button.   There are no controls anywhere.
reviews.author: Kenneth Garland

reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
reviews.comment: All you idiots complaining, learn how to use it. It\'s awesome. I\'d suggest setting an alarm that checks traffic between a certain time and notifies me if traffic on route. I only need it from 7am-830am and 530pm-6pm if it checks and notifies me during these times that would be good.
reviews.author: Mohammed Gultasab

reviews.title: not very good
reviews.comment: not good - cannot be moved to the SD card, it should be possible since it is not supposed to run in background, cannot use current location as a start position, key in current and it trys to route you from a location in Japan, :) search would be better if you could make it search for all incidents on a single road e.g the A303 or specify locations such as M1-J10. Uninstalled mainly due to the SD card deficiency.
reviews.author: David Brazendale

reviews.title: Surprised there aren\'t many downloads
reviews.comment: Excellent tool for something that\'s free. The ability to divert the route manually would be good. Google isn\'t always right. Otherwise offer incidents within 10 miles of route, for example.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Background Traffic !!!
reviews.comment: This app was hugely abusing my tada allowance in the background in thr space of 24h. Moreover did not show a single traffic. Never had such experience...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Broken
reviews.comment: I installed this app several months ago. It worked at first but for weeks now it has failed to update, giving me traffic reports that are 3 months out of date. RAC app is much better. I am getting better info by bookmarking trafficscotland in my web browser. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No traffic warnings
reviews.comment: Pretty useless app. Doesn\'t pickup data from Traffic Scotland but wastes data and runs battery down. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best ever!
reviews.comment: Bad ratings? Why!? This is a brilliant app that is accurate and has saved me from many hours in traffic! Yes the info is from highways agency but the layout is basic and helpful. Beats RAC and AA by miles!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No traffic info
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t load any traffic information even tho I am stuck in a traffic jam :-\\
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: This app doesn\'t work. Numerous times I\'ve been stuck in crash traffic on the motorway and this app hasn\'t reported anything.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t include London
reviews.comment: No feeds for London. Also find it harder to navigate around compared to other systems. Prefer just having a map that loads up as I move it around.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Can\'t setup a route. Map frequently goes totally white. The only good point is that it hasn\'t crashed the phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: wrong info
reviews.comment: i unistalled this as it said no incidents even though there were flood warnings on radio and dual carriage way closed!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Didn\'t work
reviews.comment: Was ok on my HTC but won\'t find a route on my Galaxy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No news isn\'t good news
reviews.comment: Every time I check this app there is no traffic incidents, even though the traffic scotland website says there is. Useless.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Slow
reviews.comment: Too slow and useless.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great now its working again
reviews.comment: I\'ve just reinstalled this app to replace the RAC one which is useless after its last update. Thanks Chartcross.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update lag
reviews.comment: Well behind on traffic updates, shame otherwise reasonable
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pooh
reviews.comment: Never any traffic and carnt route west yorkshire to birmingham
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Usless. Not worth the download
reviews.author: A Google User
